SQLs.SQL: select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager

select jg.dizhibm, count(*) total, sum(case when (FLOOR(datediff(DY,cc.birthDay,@日期范围Start)/365.25) >= 1 and FLOOR(datediff(DY,cc.birthDay, @日期范围End)/365.25) <=5) then 1 else 0 end) as less5 from cc_generalinfo cc left join GY_FUWUJG jg on cc.manaunitid = jg.fuwujgbh where cc.status = 0 and cc.createDate >= @日期范围Start and cc.createDate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, count(*) huochanzs, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannan, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannv, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbm from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG jg on dr.visitunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babys from perinataldeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.entryunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) yiners, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) >= 1 then 1 else 0 end) wusuidy1, count(*) wusuisw from underfiveyearsdeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.entryunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, count(*) huochanzsother, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannanother, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannvother, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbmother from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join cdh_pregnantinfo pi on pi.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG jg on dr.visitunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and pi.ownerarea != 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babysother from perinataldeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.entryunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag != 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

select jg.dizhibm, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) yinersother, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25) >= 1 then 1 else 0 end) wusuidy1other, count(*) wusuiswother from underfiveyearsdeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG jg on d.entryunitcode = jg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag != 1 and d.status = 1 and d.entrydate >= @日期范围Start and d.entrydate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and jg.HZStatisticsType=1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) group by jg.dizhibm

Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from GY_FUWUJG jg where jg.HZStatisticsType = 1 and jg.HZDMU5 = 1 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder
